mapper.select: select c.*,p.name parentName from sys_menus c left join sys_menus p on c.parentId=p.id
mapper.insert: insert into sys_menus (name, type, url, sort, parentId, permission, remark, createdTime, modifiedTime, createdUser, modifiedUser) values (#{name}, #{type}, #{url}, #{sort}, #{parentId}, #{permission}, #{remark}, now(), now(), #{createdUser}, #{modifiedUser})
mapper.update: update sys_menus set name = #{name}, type = #{type}, url = #{url}, sort = #{sort}, parentId = #{parentId}, permission = #{permission}, remark = #{remark}, modifiedTime = now(), modifiedUser = #{modifiedUser} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select distinct m.permission from sys_user_roles ur join sys_role_menus rm join sys_menus m on ur.role_id = rm.role_id and rm.menu_id = m.id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.permission is not null and trim(m.permission)!=''
